Uses of Interface
quarks.execution.DirectSubmitter

  • Packages that use DirectSubmitter 
    Package Description
    quarks.apps.runtime
    Applications which provide monitoring and failure recovery to other Quarks applications.
    quarks.providers.development
    Execution of a streaming topology in a development environment .
    quarks.providers.direct
    Direct execution of a streaming topology.
    quarks.providers.iot
    Iot provider that allows multiple applications to share an IotDevice.
    quarks.runtime.appservice  

    • Uses of DirectSubmitter in quarks.apps.runtime

      Constructors in quarks.apps.runtime with parameters of type DirectSubmitter 
      Constructor and Description
      JobMonitorApp(TopologyProvider provider, DirectSubmitter<Topology,Job> submitter, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a JobMonitorApp with the specified name in the context of the specified provider.

    • Uses of DirectSubmitter in quarks.providers.development

      Classes in quarks.providers.development that implement DirectSubmitter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DevelopmentProvider
      Provider intended for development.

    • Uses of DirectSubmitter in quarks.providers.direct

      Classes in quarks.providers.direct that implement DirectSubmitter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DirectProvider
      DirectProvider is a TopologyProvider that runs a submitted topology as a Job in threads in the current virtual machine.

    • Uses of DirectSubmitter in quarks.providers.iot

      Classes in quarks.providers.iot that implement DirectSubmitter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IotProvider
      IoT provider supporting multiple topologies with a single connection to a message hub.
